trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Crown Point
There were no other sightings in Crown Point on or around July 20th 2004
divs: Sighting Detailsi was sitting in my backyard with my nightvision looking at the stars when isaw an object come into my erea i mean the spot i could see with the nightvision and it was like a star but it moved forward backward cameback and then shot upward and kind of curved towards the right then it went out of my plain of view, and that wasnt the first time with the nightvision i have seen weird objects my wife was also with me what am i seeing
